text: Daga waɗanda suka tuba (Yahudu), akwai wasu suna karkatar da magana daga wurarenta suna cewa: "Munjiya kuma mun ƙiya, kuma ka jiya a wani wurin jiyawa, kuma ra'ina (da ma'anar 'ruɓaɓɓe'), ka tsare mu," domin karkatarwa da harsunansu, kuma domin suka a cikin addini. Kuma da lalle su, sun ce: "Mun jiya kuma mun yi ɗa'a, kuma ka saurara kuma ka dakata mana," haƙiƙa, da ya kasance mafi alheri a gare su, kuma mafi daidaita; amma Allah Ya la'ane su, saboda kafircinsu don haka ba za su yi imani ba, sai kaɗan
